short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension which allows ZAP to access the client side of a web app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ZAP is a free OSS security tool which can be used to test the security of your web apps. This browser extension will allow ZAP to gather more information about your app from the browser. Most users should not install this extension. It will be bundled in a ZAP add-on - this add-on will add the extension toChrome when it is launched from ZAP.
